meanings.definition: A small celestial body that could or did come together with many others under gravitation to form a planet.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study planetesimals to understand how planets are formed.
meanings.sent2: The planetesimal collided with other space rocks to create a new world.
meanings.sent3: The planetesimal threw a party with its celestial friends to celebrate becoming part of a planet.
meanings.sent4: In the vast universe, each planetesimal is like a puzzle piece waiting to join the cosmic picture.
meanings.sent5: Children imagine planetesimals as tiny building blocks that build up the planets we see.
